TlipocaMod:InfinityPotion.NAME: Infinity Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: In this turn, when your hand is less than #y8 , draw until 8.
In #b2 turns, when your hand is less than #y8 , draw until 8.

TlipocaMod:MasterPotion.NAME: Master Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: #ySheathe , you cannot cancel #ySheathe in this turn.

TlipocaMod:IngeniousPotion.NAME: Ingenious Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #yAttack you play deals triple damage.
The next #b2 #yAttacks you play deals triple damage.

TlipocaMod:SpringWater.NAME: Clear Spring
DESCRIPTIONS: Remove ALL your debuffs, heal #b5 HP. #yExhaust ALL #yUnplayable cards in your hand and draw that many cards.
Remove ALL your debuffs, heal #b10 HP. #yExhaust ALL #yUnplayable cards in your hand and draw that many cards.
